TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UITableViewCellSeparatorStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The visual style of a 's cell separator.
Docs.remarks: The cell separator style is set via a table view's property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCellSeparatorStyle DoubleLineEtched = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A single etched line (made up of two different colored lines) is displayed between each cell (same as SingleLineEtched). This style can only be used in grouped-style table views.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCellSeparatorStyle None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No separator is displayed between cells.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCellSeparatorStyle SingleLine = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A single line is displayed between each cell. This is the default.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCellSeparatorStyle SingleLineEtched = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A single etched line (made up of two different colored lines) is displayed between each cell. This style can only be used in grouped-style table views.
